name: HTML - <Disc 3>
description:
<--------------->

Is anyone there?

If there is, I'd like to ask a favor.

My friend is being corrupted badly.

There's no way to save him from this endless loop as he plans to open the path to the upper echelons of the multiverse.

We have to risk it. Re-enact the tale and find a way to save him directly in the engine.

However, there is a problem.

The passcodes are hidden in Disc 1 and 2. 

Only by defeating the Lead Harolds with Non-Harolds but has the spirit of Harold can unlock the codes.

Unless you know these passcodes, we are at a standstill.

In addition, I can also feel trapped friends of Harolds within the system. But they will only unlock their blessings if you can find them scattered around Disc 1 and 2.

Who are these friends? Well, its Therese, Marsha and Lucius of course. These four make up the core team of MV.

I wish I can say anymore but there is nothing more I can add other than this.

Please... I need your help. I can't do anything. I am trapped.

Someone... Anyone...

<--------------->

Mechanics

- Combat-oriented system that will test your knowledge of your skill usage while also figuring out a way to defeat the immortal forces of Harolds.
